languages.text: {n}Кивнув, Паскаль чеканит:{/n} "По праву Магоса Эксплоратора, награжденного четырьмя повышениями в статусе на одну ступень и правом на священную аугментацию третьей категории, а также, вероятно, единственного действующего рукоположенного техножреца Адептус Механикус на данном пустотном корабле, я назначаю себя высшим иерархом судна".

{n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."
languages.original_text: {n}Кивнув, Паскаль чеканит:{/n} "По праву Магоса Эксплоратора, награжденного четырьмя повышениями в статусе на одну ступень и правом на священную аугментацию третьей категории, а также, вероятно, единственного действующего рукоположенного техножреца Адептус Механикус на данном пустотном корабле, я назначаю себя высшим иерархом судна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-degree promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはうなずいて朗々と告げる。{/n}「4回にわたって1階級昇進を遂げ、カテゴリー3の神聖オーギュメント化の権限を持つマゴス探検家、そしてこのヴォイド船に搭乗して活動できるおそらく唯一の帝国技術局技術司祭の任を受けた権限に基づき、自分自身をこのヴォイドシップの最高ハイエラークとする」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはうなずいて朗々と告げる。{/n}「4回にわたって1階級昇進を遂げ、カテゴリー3の神聖オーギュメント化の権限を持つマゴス探検家、そしてこのヴォイド船に搭乗して活動できるおそらく唯一の帝国技術局技術司祭の任を受けた権限に基づき、自分自身をこのヴォイドシップの最高ハイエラークとする」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡点了点头，郑重说道。{/n}“我是被授予授予四级晋升和三类植入改造的开拓贤者。鉴于我的权力，以及我可能是这艘虚空舰上唯一的机械修会技术神甫，我在此任命自己为这艘船的最高指挥官。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡点了点头，郑重说道。{/n}“我是被授予授予四级晋升和三类植入改造的开拓贤者。鉴于我的权力，以及我可能是这艘虚空舰上唯一的机械修会技术祭司，我在此任命自己为这艘船的最高指挥官。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal acquiesce.{/n} « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés en tant que magos explorator décoré de quatre promotions de premier degré, autorisé à porter des augmentations sacrées de catégorie trois, et possiblement en tant qu'unique technoprêtre à bord ordonné officiellement par l'Adeptus Mechanicus, je m'autoproclame hiérarche suprême de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal acquiesce.{/n} « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés en tant que magos explorateur décoré de quatre promotions de premier degré, autorisé à porter des augmentations sacrées de catégorie trois, et possiblement en tant qu'unique technoprêtre à bord ordonné officiellement par l'Adeptus Mechanicus, je m'autoproclame hiérarche suprême de ce vaisseau. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal asiente y enuncia:{/n} «Por mi poder como Magos explorador condecorado con cuatro promociones de primer grado y el derecho a llevar aumentos sagrados de categoría tres, así como la posibilidad de que sea el único tecnosacerdote en activo del Adeptus Mechanicus a bordo, me nombro a mí mismo jerarca supremo de esta nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal asiente y enuncia:{/n} «Por mi poder como magos explorador condecorado con cuatro promociones de primer grado y el derecho a llevar aumentos sagrados de categoría tres, así como la posibilidad de que sea el único tecnosacerdote en activo del Adeptus Mechanicus a bordo, me nombro a mí mismo jerarca supremo de esta nave».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal nickt und verkündet:{/n} "Kraft meiner Autorität als Magos Explorator, dekoriert mit vier Beförderungen von Grad 1 sowie der Berechtigung zur Nutzung heiliger Augmentationen der Kategorie 3 sowie als wohl der einzige aktive geweihte Techpriester des Adeptus Mechanicus an Bord dieses Raumschiff ernenne ich mich zum oberersten Hierarchen dieses Schiffs."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal nickt und verkündet:{/n} "Kraft meiner Autorität als Magos Explorator, dekoriert mit vier Beförderungen von Grad 1 sowie der Berechtigung zur Nutzung heiliger Augmentationen der Kategorie 3 sowie als wohl der einzige aktive geweihte Techpriester des Adeptus Mechanicus an Bord dieses Raumschiff ernenne ich mich zum oberersten Hierarchen dieses Schiffs."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, onaylar anlamda başını sallayıp düşüncesini bildiriyor.{/n} "Dört adet birinci seviye terfiye layık görülmüş, bir adet de Üçüncü Kategori kutsal ogmentasyonla ödüllendirilmiş bir Magos Keşiftör oluşum ve bu uçsuz gemisindeki muhtemelen tek aktif ve yetkili Adeptus Mechanicus Tekno Rahibi olmamın bana sağladığı güçle, kendimi bu geminin baş din adamı ilan ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal nods and enunciates,{/n} "By my power as a Magos Explorator decorated with four one-grade promotions and an entitlement to Category Three sacred augmentation, as well as likely the only active ordained Tech-Priest of the Adeptus Mechanicus aboard this voidship, I appoint myself this vessel's supreme hierarch."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal onaylar anlamda başını sallıyor ve bu düşünceyi ifade ediyor:{/n} "Dört adet birinci seviye terfiye layık görülmüş ve bir adet Üçüncü Kagetori kutsal ogmentasyonla ödüllendirilmiş bir Magos Keşiftör olmamın ve de bu uçsuz gemisindeki muhtemelen tek aktif ve yetkili Adeptus Mechanicus Tekno Rahip'i olmamın bana sağladığı güçle, kendimi bu geminin baş din görevlisi ilan ediyorum."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
